Resume

Arif Huseynov

Transport Modeller and Data Scientist



Hello and welcome to my personal site. If we are not yet familiar with each other, then let me introduce myself - my name is Arif, which is translated from Arabic as "knowledgeable, wise ".

Do I live up to my name? To be honest, I don’t know. But I know for sure the following - every evening of every day of my life I become smarter than I was in the morning. Smarter by one article I read about applying a machine algorithm, one video I watched about programming, or one Wikipedia page about ancient history that I love so madly. Every new day I have one answer and hundreds of new questions ... Welcome to my new day!
